scripts.dev: BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=BoServer nodemon server/boServer.js --ignore 'server/static_dev/' --exec babel-node
scripts.dev-cross: cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=BoServer nodemon server/boServer.js --ignore 'server/static_dev/' --exec babel-node
scripts.dev:insertInitialData: cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=BoServer INSERT_INITIAL_DATA=true nodemon server/boServer.js --ignore 'server/static_dev/' --exec "babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2"
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production SERVER_NAME=BoServer nodemon distBoServer/boServer.js
scripts.prod:insertInitialData: npm run build:prod && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production SERVER_NAME=BoServer INSERT_INITIAL_DATA=true nodemon distBoServer/boServer.js
